review: Dr.Mitra is very friendly and approachable and an outstanding doctor overall.My misaligned teeth took 3 yrs but Dr.Soumya Mitra was so confident that I was not at all  douftful of getting treated by him. I strongly recommend Dr. Mitra ** **  ** *** *** ****** ************* ** ********

The doctor made our teenage daughter feel comfortable right off the bat. He explained the procedural treatment options concisely and with clarity.  Looking forward to continuing doctor support as we proceed with the recommended treatment plan.

review: I am very hopeful that my son will have get over qith qll the problems which he was facing since after his major accident.  Sir always cooperates and very friendly. All the best to him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent dr and hygienic clinic, considering the current pandemic scenario. So glad we didn’t have to wait at all.

Love The Art of Braces! Dr. Soumo Mitra and her staff have made me feel super comfortable not only with their professionalism but also their protocols during COVID-19. Dr. Soumo Mitra is awesome  at answering all my questions and communicates in a way that is easy to understand.
